sentence.Network_en: Hexose A sugar that has six carbon atoms in its molecules.

sentence.Network_en: Contains exclusive hexose and algae that work together to revitalise the skin by increasing cell turnover.

sentence.Network_en: Selective dehydration of hexose, such as D - fructose, is one of main synthetic methods for 5 - hydroxymethylfurfural.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 己糖（hexose）(Hexose)，又称为六碳糖，是含有6个碳原子的单糖。己糖（hexose）在自然界分布最广，数量也最多，与机体的营养代谢也最密切。
